original_title: Berryz工房コンサートツアー2013春〜Berryzマンション入居者募集中！〜
overview: Berryz Kobo was a Japanese idol girl group part of Hello! Project, produced by Tsunku. "Berryz Mansion Nyuukyosha Boshuuchuu!" features a concert from their 2013 spring tour.
title: Berryz Kobo Concert Tour 2013 Haru: Berryz Mansion Nyuukyosha Boshuuchuu!
